entry.title: Our Most Read Stories This Week: Pump.fun Hack, Blast Token, S& P on RWA, SOL vs. ETH, Sonne Exploit, Lido Takes on EigenLayer
entry.summary: The Defiant's most read stories for the week of May 13.

entry.title: Deutsche Bank Says Tokenization Is The Future Of Financial Innovation
entry.summary: Deutsche Bank is the latest global financial institutional to praise tokenization after joining the Monetary Authority of Singapore's Project Guardian initiative.

entry.title: MakerDAO Founder Unveils Two New Stablecoins
entry.summary: The new stablecoins are part of MakerDAO’s controversial Endgame plan and are intended to eventually replace DAI.

entry.title: Crypto Markets Surge on Positive ETF Inflows
entry.summary: Bitcoin rallied above $67,000 for the first time in nearly a month, while ETH surged 5%.

entry.title: Did U.S. Regulators Just Legitimize MEV Extraction?
entry.summary: Experts weigh in on the implications of the first U.S. indictment involving MEV extraction.

entry.title: Pump.fun Identifies Ex-Employee in $1.9M Breach
entry.summary: Pump.fun has redeployed the contracts, and trading is now live with 0% fees for the next seven days.

entry.title: Meet The Gigabrains Shaping The Future Of Web3
entry.summary: ETHDenver is a leading Ethereum-based event that combines hackathons, workshops, and discussions, fostering innovation and community building in the blockchain space.

entry.title: U.S. Senate Rejects SEC’s Crypto Accounting Rule But Biden May Veto The Vote
entry.summary: The resolution received bipartisan support in both the Senate and House of Representatives.

entry.title: DTCC Leverages Chainlink for Smart NAV Pilot
entry.summary: The pilot program explored the feasibility of delivering mutual fund price and rate data using Chainlink’s CCIP.

entry.title: Why Memecoins, Despite Being Unserious By Nature, Seriously Exemplify Web3’s Core Value Proposition
entry.summary: Memecoins are a prime example of how any collective group of individuals can create the economic infrastructure to facilitate commerce, trade, and collaboration without the need for an intermediary.

entry.title: Sei Token Pops on V2 Roadmap

entry.summary: The Solana-based memecoin platform has become a favored venue for token launches in recent weeks.

entry.summary: Solana continues to outperform, with a 10% gain in the last week.

entry.title: Solana Surpasses Ethereum By Revenue After Parabolic Fee Spike
entry.summary: The Solana community is celebrating record-high revenue, but the milestone is a sign users are paying high transaction fees.

entry.title: Bitcoin Price Bounces After 900+ Institutions Reveal $10.7B In Spot ETF Buys

entry.title: Blast Delays Token Launch But Increases Airdrop Allocation

entry.summary: The move comes ahead of the USDC issuer’s potential IPO, for which it filed paperwork with the SEC in January.

entry.title: BlackRock's BUIDL | Creating The Largest Tokenized Treasury Fund With Securitize
entry.summary: Carlos Domingo is the founder and CEO of Securitize, a platform for issuing and trading security tokens or digital securities on the blockchain. Securitize aims to modernize the traditional financial markets by leveraging blockchain technology to provide greater accessibility, efficiency, and transparency in securities trading. Securitize recently partnered up with BlackRock to explore innovations in tokenizing assets and broadening access to the private capital markets. In today's podcast, we uncover all the details behind this collaboration and explore what the future holds for tokenized innovation.
